about_the_game:
Explore the void, a mysterious place where the laws of the universe don’t always function as expected, and discover the secrets hidden there. Travel through a massive procedurally generated map of distinct areas and biomes, each with their own unique challenges.


Fight against an onslaught of mining drones reprogrammed to protect their master’s secrets, as well as the threats and terrors of the void that long predate human intervention. Utilize Salvage’s deep and complex combat system to defeat your enemies as you manage every aspect of your ship to exploit the weaknesses in theirs.


Scavenge from shipwrecks, space stations and even your enemies for the resources you need to survive, making your enemies tools your own. Discover and enhance weapons and machinery from ages past, and augment it with your own skills.


Use a massive range of modular parts to upgrade and enhance your ship, with a huge range of customisation and play styles available. Build and enhance your ship with modules by combining and attaching components to them, transforming their functionality.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-6200U @ 2.30GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-770 CPU @ 2.80Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti

short_description: Salvage is a sci fi action rogue-like, in which you navigate the wreckage of a corporate mining operation amidst a dying void, salvaging what you can in order to return home. With a functioning coffee machine.
